mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users u JOIN user_auth auth ON u.user_id = auth.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_auth( user_id, auth) VALUES (#{userId}, #{auth})
INSERT INTO users (id, password, name, email, phone, birth, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, birth = #{birth}, address = #{address} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
